instance.name: TEST Sharp Wave Ripples Derived from Allen Institute Visual Behavior Neuropixels Data
instance.citation: Roy, Katherine (2024) TEST Sharp Wave Ripples Derived from Allen Institute Visual Behavior Neuropixels Data (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001175/draft
instance.description: This data is derived from sharp wave ripples extracted from the Allen Institute's Visual Behaviour Neuropixels dataset. Dandiset folders and file names retain the same structure as the files in the Visual Behaviour dandiset (000713), with the addition of 'swr' in the title.
